findings.title: Divide Before Multiply
findings.description: Performing division before multiplication can lead to loss of precision.

findings.title: Arbitrary Jump with Function Type Variable
findings.description: The use of Assembly should be minimal and do not allow users to assign arbitrary values to function type variables.

findings.title: Right-To-Left-Override control character(U+202E)
findings.description: The presence of Right-To-Left-Override control character (U+202E) can potentially lead to text encoding issues and affect the functionality of the smart contract.

findings.title: Presence of unused variables
findings.description: Unused variables are present in the contract.

findings.title: Hash Collisions With Multiple Variable Arguments
Message call with hardcoded gas amount
findings.description: Hardcoded gas amounts can lead to unexpected behavior and potential security vulnerabilities.

findings.title: Code With No Effects
findings.description: The code has no effects on the overall functionality of the contract.

findings.title: Unencrypted Private Data On-Chain
findings.description: Private data is stored unencrypted on-chain, potentially exposing sensitive information.

findings.title: Reentrancy
findings.description: Functions `_transfer` and `swapAndLiquify` Reentrancy detected through external calls.

findings.title: Floating Pragma is Set
findings.description: The compiler version should be a fixed one to avoid undiscovered compiler bugs.
